summary: AN ORDINANCE establishing a Stadium Event Restricted Parking Zone in the Montlake Neighborhood with restrictions upon public parking in the zone on dates of stadium events attended by 24,000 or more people; authorizing implementation by the Traffic ENGINEER; AND PROVIDING FOR APPLICATION OF SEATTLE MUNICIPAL CODE SECTIONS 11.14.515, 11.72.351 AND 11.28.010, AND AMENDING SMC 11.16.280.
